name: lane-county-housing-monorepo
description: Lane County Housing Development - Full Stack Platform

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n api,crm,portal,site -c blue,green,yellow,magenta "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:crm" "npm run dev:portal" "npm run dev:site"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --prefix devops-crm install && npm --prefix devops-crm/client install && npm --prefix investor-portal install && npm --prefix consturction_development install
scripts.build: npm run build:site && npm run build:crm && npm run build:portal
